descriptions.value: In sendHalfSheetCancelBroadcast of HalfSheetActivity.java, there is a possible way to learn nearby BT MAC addresses due to an unrestricted broadcast intent. This could lead to local information disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-13Android ID: A-234442700

In avdt_scb_hdl_write_req of avdt_scb_act.cc, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a heap buffer overflow. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-11 Android-12 Android-12L Android-13Android ID: A-242535997
